dmca.title: DMCA Notification and credit card theft
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Fisher [mailto:tomf@ccbill.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 2004 2:16 PM
To: gpoletes@theplanet.com
Subject: FW: DMCA Notification and credit card theft
Importance: High

 

Thanks for the phone call. After checking your website, I sent this to Mr.
Crosby. I would appreciate your help.

 

Tom Fisher

 

  _____  

From: Tom Fisher 
Sent: Thursday, December 16, 2004 12:48 PM
To: 'copyright@theplanet.com'
Cc: 'Stephanie Hancock'
Subject: DMCA Notification and credit card theft
Importance: High

 

Dear Mr. Crosby:

 

Attached is a notification of:

1 Copyright infringement

2. Service mark infringement and disparagement

3. Fraudulent harvesting of credit card information by one of ThePlanet's
clients.

 

Please take immediate action to prevent any further illegal activity by this
website. Obviously CCBill is prepared to take what ever legal action is
necessary to protect its marks and intellectual property.

 

I would appreciate a response to this notification.

 

Tom Fisher

Executive Vice President

(480) 449-7761

 

CC: Special Agent Stephanie Hancock, FBI - Phoenix
